General_Description: '''Spartan Futility''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Athens|Athenian]] [[Ship|vessels]] can't keep up with the [[Sparta]]n [[penteconter]]s."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and sank a number of Spartan penteconters all over [[Greece]], gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[Dangerous Courage]] and [[Red Tears on the Sea]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
